snippet: The widow and mother-in-law of a Pakistani man killed by a C.I.A. contractor last year were killed Monday, apparently by the widow’s father, who may have feared that she would remarry and take the money she received as compensation with her, the...
abstract: Shahzad Butt kills his daughter Zohra Haider, widow of Pakistani man killed by CIA contractor Raymond A Davis in 2011, and her mother, apparently fearing Haider would remarry and take money she received as compensation with her; families of the two men killed by Davis received hundreds of thousands of dollars of 'blood money' in exchange for pardoning Davis.
lead_paragraph: The widow and mother-in-law of a Pakistani man killed by a C.I.A. contractor last year were killed Monday, apparently by the widow’s father, who may have feared that she would remarry and take the money she received as compensation with her, the police said.

headline.main: Pakistan: ‘Blood Money’ Linked to Widow’s Killing, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: ‘Blood Money’ Linked To Widow’s Killing, Police Say
